channel.title: Skill icons [pi]
channel.description:
im using erasedpkz source and the icons in the skill tab suck.
in the cache i have the 602 icons and would much prefer to use these. Is there an easy way to change them?

item.title: Skill icons [pi]
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Just add a 602 skill tab or change the sprite directory in client.java. Search up “sideicons” and find:

for(int j3 = 0; j3 <= 14; j3++) sideIcons[j3] = new Sprite(streamLoader_2, "sideicons", j3);

And change it with:

for (int nSI = 0; nSI <= 14; nSI++) sideIcons[nSI] = new Sprite("Gameframe/SIcons/562/icon " + nSI);

And change the sprite directory to where ever your sideicons are.[/code]

Read full topic
